text: Jehangir Ratanji Dadabhoy Tata (29 July 1904 - 29 November 1993) was an aviator and an important businessman in India. He was given India's highest civilian award, the Bharat Ratna in 1992.A report in Vohuman.org He was born in Paris. His parents were Persian and French. ==References== Category:1904 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Indian businesspeople Category:Businesspeople from Paris Category:Aviators
title: J. R. D. Tata
